title: run.bat出现问题
author: garyfrank
txt_content:
连接时，就一直显示连线中
但那个.BAT档案就一直出现这些语句
救解决
java.net.socketexception:select failed
    at java.net.plainsocketimpl.socketaccept<native method>
    at java.net.plainsocketimpl.accept<unknow source>
    at java.net.serversocket.accept<unknow source>
    at java.net.serversocket.implaccept<unknow source>
    at.net.minecraft.sever.networkaccepthread.run<netwodkaccepthread.java:22>
